localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: We’ve trained a neural network called DALL·E that creates images from text captions for a wide range of concepts expressible in natural language.
blogPost.body: We’ve trained a neural network called DALL·E that creates images from text captions for a wide range of concepts expressible in natural language.
blogPost.title: DALL-E - Creating images from text, from Open AI
blogPost.author: Aaron  O'Leary

localize.description: 我们训练了一种名为Dall·E的神经网络，它从文本字幕中为一系列可以用自然语言表达的概念创建图像。
localize.tagline: 从文本创建图像，从Open AI创建图像

localize.description: 我們訓練了一種名爲Dall·E的神經網絡，它從文本字幕中爲一系列可以用自然語言表達的概念創建圖像。
localize.tagline: 從文本創建圖像，從Open AI創建圖像

previous.excerpt: 🍞 Jam is an open source implementation of audio spaces (think: Clubhouse, Twitter Spaces, Orbit, …). Jam lets you can create rooms that can be used for panel discussions, jam sessions, free flowing conversations, debates, theatre plays, musicals and more.
previous.title: Jam - Your own version of Clubhouse for mini conferences & friends

localize.description: 🍞 Jam是一个开源的音频空间实现（想想看：Clubhouse，Twitter Spaces，Orbit，...）。Jam让你可以创建可用于小组讨论、果酱会议、自由流动的对话、辩论、戏剧、音乐剧等的房间。
localize.tagline: 您自己的小型会议和朋友聚会的会所版本。

localize.description: 🍞 Jam是一個開源的音頻空間實現（想想看：Clubhouse，Twitter Spaces，Orbit，...）。Jam讓你可以創建可用於小組討論、果醬會議、自由流動的對話、辯論、戲劇、音樂劇等的房間。
localize.tagline: 您自己的小型會議和朋友聚會的會所版本。

next.excerpt: DogeHouse is an open-source audio chat on the web. No more begging for invitations. Works across all platforms. Powered by Doge 🐶
next.title: DogeHouse - Open-source audio chat on the web.

localize.description: DogeHouse是一个开源的网络音频聊天。不再需要乞求邀请。适用于所有平台。Powered by Doge🐶
localize.tagline: 网络上开源的音频聊天。

localize.description: DogeHouse是一個開源的網絡音頻聊天。不再需要乞求邀請。適用於所有平臺。Powered by Doge🐶
localize.tagline: 網絡上開源的音頻聊天。
